caption.p: Differential expression of LE genes following PC progression. The curated GEO GDS2546 dataset was used for these analyses. Normal prostate tissue (prostate) n = 67, primary PCs ( n = 66), and mPCs ( n = 25) [ 56, 57]. * p < 0.05, *** p < 0.001 in comparison to normal prostate tissues; $ p < 0.05, $$ p < 0.01, $$$ p < 0.001 in comparison to primary PCs. One-way ANOVA was performed, followed by post-hoc analysis using the Tukeyâ€™s multiple comparisons test.
